title: rent studio Paris belleville
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


rent an independent studio room at the inhabitant's minimum 1 month, six months maximum, fully equipped, located on the 1st floor, quiet in a flowered courtyard, rare and highly sought after in Paris, close to public transport (2 minutes walk), Belleville bus and metro.
looking for a discreet and respectful tenant.
the rental price is 890 euros per month + allow 50 euros of charges per month (water, electricity, collective central heating + internet adsl).

2 months deposit

available OCTOBER 15.
no parties allowed.
No Apl.
Animals are not allowed.
do not smoke inside. 

.
